sourcesContent:
{{selectedService.description}}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-viewdescription', templateUrl: './viewdescription.component.html', styleUrls: ['./viewdescription.component.css'] }) export class ViewdescriptionComponent { services = [ { name: 'Service A', description: 'Description of Service A' }, { name: 'Service B', description: 'Description of Service B' }, { name: 'Service C', description: 'Description of Service C' } ]; selectedService = {}; showDescription = false; showServiceDescription(service) { this.selectedService = service; this.showDescription = true; } hideServiceDescription() { this.showDescription = false; } }
